text:
Hi guys, I need support with the CRM Extension API.
I have created an app, authenticated it,

I’m using Mocky to create a sample API endpoint
<http://www.mocky.io/v2/5e90366e330000541827d58d|www.mocky.io/v2/5e90366e330000541827d58d>
Is the Mocky endpoint missing a header that I couldn’t find in the documentation?
This url was set both as the Data fetch URL and as the whitelist action URL.
All properties have also been set as Card Properties...
But I get an error on the Card, still.... Could someone help me out?
Thanks

Hi david,

have you tried using the below endpoint?
``````
`<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/?hapikey=demo>`



<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/create_contact>

On the right hand side, there’s an example of the payload you need to usre
